name: AirRunner
description:
Feel the speed, cut through air

AirRunner is a first-person parkour game where you can test your speedrunning and parkour skills.

Complete levels as fast as possible and compete with others for online leaderboard spots.

· Parkour mechanics (wall running, sliding ect.)

· Built-in timer for best speedrun experience

· Online leaderboard

New features and levels will be added each update so stay tuned and train your skills to the perfection. To install the game:

· Click Download Now button below

· If you want to donate the game choose the price, if not click No thanks, just take me to the downloads and follow install instructions
